verses.roman:
yata bhakta kīrtanīyā āsiyā ārāme
prati-vṛkṣa-tale sabe karena viśrāme

synonyms: yata bhakta—all the devotees; kīrtanīyā—who were performing saṅkīrtana; āsiyā—coming; ārāme—in the resting place; prati-vṛkṣa-tale—under each and every tree; sabe—all of them; karena—take; viśrāme—rest.
translation: All the devotees who were performing saṅkīrtana came there and took rest under each and every tree.
